0.text: Innate:  Takedowns on enemy champions within 3 seconds of being damaged by Katarina reduce her abilities' current  cooldowns by 15 seconds.

1.text: Innate - Sinister Steel: Whenever Katarina retrieves a Dagger, she uses it to slash around herself, dealing 68 − 240 (based on level) (+ 75% bonus AD) (+ 55 / 66 / 77 / 88% (based on level) AP) magic damage to nearby enemies and applying  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness to enemy  champions hit, as well as reducing  Shunpo's current  cooldown by 78 / 84 / 90 / 96% (based on level).

2.text: Daggers will disappear after being on the ground for 4 seconds.

0.text: Active: Katarina throws a Dagger at the target enemy that upon arrival bounces to up to 2 nearby enemies, dealing magic damage to each target hit.

1.text: The Dagger then lands onto the ground after 1 second, 350 units opposite from where it struck its last target.

2.text: The Dagger bounces to targets regardless of having  sight of them or not.

0.text: Active: Katarina tosses a Dagger into the air above her current location and gains  bonus movement speed that decays until it lands after 1.25 seconds as well as  ghosting for the same duration.
Active: Katarina  blinks to the target location around the target unit or Dagger, dealing magic damage to the nearest enemy in range and applying  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.

1.text: Shunpo  resets Katarina's basic attack timer.

2.text: Upon blinking, Katarina remains unable to act via a cast time for 0.15 seconds.

0.text: Active: Katarina  channels for up to 2.5 seconds, rapidly spinning in place to throw a dagger every 0.166 seconds to up to 3 of the closest nearby enemy  champions,  revealing herself in the process. Each dagger deals physical damage and magic damage, applies  on-hit and  on-attack effects, and inflicts 60%  Grievous Wounds on the target for 3 seconds.

origin: 16% (+ 12.8% per 1.0 total attack speed) bonus ad
240% (+ 192% per 1.0 total attack speed) bonus ad

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Passive

Unique – Glory: Gain 2 stacks for each champion kill and 1 stack for each assist, up to a maximum of 10 stacks. Lose 4 stacks on death. Stacks are preserved when upgrading to Mejai's Soulstealer.
Unique – Dread: Gain 5 ability power for each stack of Glory.
